scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin martinsdoubt.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/martinsdoubt.html && usemin astronomylab.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/astronomylab.html && usemin biologylab.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/biologylab.html && usemin chemistrylab.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/chemistrylab.html && usemin physicslab.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/physicslab.html && usemin mathematicslab.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/mathematicslab.html && usemin statisticslab.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/statisticslab.html && usemin whatobjective.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/whatobjective.html && usemin whoproyect.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/whoproyect.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run scss && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
